鶌鶌鶌

鶌字的基本解释

鶌
qū
〔鶌鸠（
ji?）〕一种小鸠。

鶌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》九勿切，入物，見。］
见“鶌鳩”。
[②]［qū］
［《集韻》曲勿切，入迄，溪。］
见“鶌2鶋”。

鶌字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶌； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1494第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?九勿切，音?。【說文】鶌鳩也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶌鳩，鶻鵃。【郭註】似山鵲而小。又【集韻】曲勿切，音?。【山海經】馬成山有鳥，狀如烏，首白，身靑，足黃，名鶌鶋，食之不饑。

鶌字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶌字的起名意思

暂无。

鶌
Basic explanation of words
鶌
qū
〔鶌鶌(
ji?)] A kind of small dove.
鶌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" Nine do not cut, enter the object, see. ]
See "Jijiu".
[②]［qū］
["Jiyun" song do not cut, enter the end, stream. ]
See "鶌2鶋".
鶌
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶌; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1494 No. 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Do not cut the nine, the sound?. [Said the text] Qi Jiu also. 【Erya·Shiniao】鶌-dove, 鹘鵃. [Guo's Note] Like a mountain magpie but small. Also [Jiyun] Do not cut the song, the sound?. [Shanhaijing] Ma Chengshan has birds, like black, white head, yellowish body, yellow feet, name 鶌鶋, no food hungry.
鶌
